question.text: You have just driven out of fog. Visibility is now good. You MUST

explanation.text: You MUST turn off your fog lights if visibility is over 100 metres (328 feet). However, be prepared for the fact that the fog may be patchy.

answer.text: switch off all your fog lights
keep your rear fog lights on
keep your front fog lights on
leave fog lights on in case fog returns
